snippet.title: Dune 2 HD Remake (Dynasty Project) Tour & Skirmish - Part 2/2
snippet.description:
INTRO:
Dune Dynasty is a reverse engineered reconstruction of Dune 2 for windows using the OpenDune source files allowing skirmish, high resolutions, modern C&C style unit controls (eg box dragging & unit groups) and building options (even with build queues). This is part 2 of my Dune Dynasty Tour & Skirmish game.

CONTENTS:
Part 1
https://youtu.be/4LB1ebNYZzI?list=PLZqnaGtTZxFYhzg4kOt6bN4qD02wbuGI9
- Tour of cool features
- Skirmish Game
Part 2
- 0:00 Skirmish game continued

ABOUT:
Dune Dynasty is remake/reconstruction of Dune 2 for windows using the OpenDune source files allowing skirmish, high resolutions, modern C&C style unit controls (eg box dragging & unit groups) and building options (even with build queues). But what makes Dynasty different to all the others out there is the fact it also allows you to load in fan made addon campaigns like Super Dune 2 Classic and Dune 2 eXtended which famously added campaigns for the Fremen, Mercenaries and Imperial Sardukar. Normally those fan addons can only be played through the original Dos based Dune 2 with its limited graphics & ancient controls, so to now be able to play them in high resolution with modern controls is awesome!

For now I'd still recommend Legacy over this for skirmish maps and playing original Dune 2 as it has more maps and is easier to configure (I hate having to mess with ini files) however Dynasty should be your number 1 option for playing the fan campaigns until Legacy adds support for them (Legacy recently added Super Dune 2 & enhanced it! So fingers crossed they do the same with eXtended). Also be warned that Dynasty requires the EU European edition of Dune 2 1.07. It will work with the 1.07 US copy that most of us have however you won't get unit voices (eg "reporting" "acknowledged" etc).

NOTES:
- I haven't played Dune 2 in over 10yrs so I suck a bit sorry lol.

LINKS:
Dune 2 Dynasty homepage:
http://dunedynasty.sourceforge.net/

To see more D2Dynasty and Dune related info, downloads, pictures & video visit my Dune Games Webpage here:
http://blakessanctum.x10.mx/Games/DuneGames/

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
Welcome To Blake's Sanctum! :)
Intro: https://youtu.be/EsSfHqBz2IU

If you wish to donate or support my work:

Paypal Donation: https://paypal.me/blakessanctum
